matrix-project.description: Creates SDK Installer Packages for all combinations.

hudson.plugins.copyartifact.BuildSelecto.name: BUILD_SELECTOR_MEDIASDK_PKG
hudson.plugins.copyartifact.BuildSelecto.description: Bundle Media SDK 1.1. GA Installer by default.

hudson.model.BooleanParameterDefinition.name: PRODUCTION_WEB
hudson.model.BooleanParameterDefinition.description: If Checked then creates online installer components, which need to be uploaded to the appropriate sftp server.

scm.projectOptions: allwrite clobber nocompress unlocked nomodtime rmdir

hudson.tasks.BatchFile.command:
@echo off setlocal
echo PRODUCTION_URL_VERSION: %PRODUCTION_URL_VERSION%
set ISM=%WORKSPACE%\UnifiedInstaller.ism
:: This script updates the %ISM% with the appropriate URL for the packages to be downloaded. :: The URL is driven by a build parameter and the default is http://cas.amd.com:8089/APPSDK/%PRODUCT_VERSION%/x86
if defined PRODUCTION_WEB ( if "%PRODUCTION_WEB%"=="true" ( echo PRODUCTION_WEB is true. Updating for developer.amd.com. %PERL% -pi.bak -e "s!http://cas.amd.com:8089/UnifiedSDKInstaller/x86!http://amd-dev.wpengine.netdna-cdn.com/app-sdk/installers/UnifiedSDKInstaller/%PRODUCTION_URL_VERSION%/web/x86!g;" "%ISM%" %PERL% -pi.bak -e "s!http://cas.amd.com:8089/UnifiedSDKInstaller/amd64!http://amd-dev.wpengine.netdna-cdn.com/app-sdk/installers/UnifiedSDKInstaller/%PRODUCTION_URL_VERSION%/web/x64!g;" "%ISM%" ) else ( echo PRODUCTION_WEB is not true. Updating for cas.amd.com. %PERL% -pi.bak -e "s!http://cas.amd.com:8089/UnifiedSDKInstaller/x86!http://cas.amd.com:8089/UnifiedSDKInstaller/%PRODUCT_VERSION%/x86!g;" "%ISM%" %PERL% -pi.bak -e "s!http://cas.amd.com:8089/UnifiedSDKInstaller/amd64!http://cas.amd.com:8089/UnifiedSDKInstaller/%PRODUCT_VERSION%/amd64!g;" "%ISM%" ) ) else ( echo PRODUCTION_WEB is not defined. Updating for cas.amd.com. %PERL% -pi.bak -e "s!http://cas.amd.com:8089/UnifiedSDKInstaller/x86!http://cas.amd.com:8089/UnifiedSDKInstaller/%PRODUCT_VERSION%/x86!g;" "%ISM%" %PERL% -pi.bak -e "s!http://cas.amd.com:8089/UnifiedSDKInstaller/amd64!http://cas.amd.com:8089/UnifiedSDKInstaller/%PRODUCT_VERSION%/amd64!g;" "%ISM%" )
%PERL% -pi.bak -e "s?Copying new files?Downloading and Installing new files?g;" "%ISM%" %PERL% -pi.bak -e "s?Setup is preparing the InstallShield Wizard which will guide you through the program setup process. Please wait.?Setup is preparing the InstallShield Wizard which will guide you through the program setup process. Please wait while we contact the web for additional information.?g;" "%ISM%" %PERL% -pi.bak -e "s?Computing space requirements?Please wait while we contact the web for space requirements?g;" "%ISM%" %PERL% -pi.bak -e "s?Resolving source. Please wait...?Resolving source download location. Please wait.?g;" "%ISM%"
endlocal

@echo off setlocal enabledelayedexpansion
echo ComputeSDK_PKG_MM_PB_W: %COPYARTIFACT_BUILD_NUMBER_APPSDK_PKG_MM_PB_W% echo ComputeSDK_PKG_MM_SRC_W: %COPYARTIFACT_BUILD_NUMBER_APPSDK_PKG_MM_SRC_W% echo ComputeSDK_PKG_MM_PB_APARAPI_W: %COPYARTIFACT_BUILD_NUMBER_APPSDK_PKG_MM_PB_APARAPI_W% echo SDKInstallManager_BUILD: %COPYARTIFACT_BUILD_NUMBER_SDKInstallManager_BUILD% echo MEDIASDK_PKG: %COPYARTIFACT_BUILD_NUMBER_MEDIASDK_PKG% echo ComputeSDK_DIR_VERSION: %DIR_VERSION% echo ComputeSDK_METRIC_VERSION: %ComputeSDK_METRIC_VERSION%
echo MEDIASDK_DIR_VERSION: %MEDIASDK_DIR_VERSION% echo MEDIASDK_METRIC_VERSION: %MEDIASDK_METRIC_VERSION%
::-Get the MEDIASDK_BUILD_NUMBER ::-MediaSDK PKG: for /r %%i in MediaSDK-v1.1.334.21-Beta-windows-neutral-MM.7z ::------------------------------------------- for /r %%i in (MediaSDK-*-%OSTYPE%-*-MM.7z) do ( set MSDK_MM_FILENAME=%%~ni )
echo Media SDK MergeModule filename: !MSDK_MM_FILENAME!
for /f "tokens=1,2,3,4 delims=." %%a in ('echo !MSDK_MM_FILENAME!') do ( set MEDIASDK_MAJOR_NUMBER_FULL=%%a set MEDIASDK_MINOR_NUMBER=%%b set MEDIASDK_BUILD_NUMBER=%%c set MEDIASDK_PKG_NUMBER_FULL=%%d )
echo MEDIASDK_MAJOR_NUMBER_FULL: !MEDIASDK_MAJOR_NUMBER_FULL! echo MEDIASDK_MINOR_NUMBER: !MEDIASDK_MINOR_NUMBER! echo MEDIASDK_BUILD_NUMBER: !MEDIASDK_BUILD_NUMBER! echo MEDIASDK_PKG_NUMBER_FULL: !MEDIASDK_PKG_NUMBER_FULL!
::- Now parse the MEDIASDK_MAJOR_NUMBER from MEDIASDK_MAJOR_NUMBER_FULL, it will be of the form MediaSDK-v1 ::-Split on the v letter for /f "tokens=2 delims=v" %%a in ( 'echo !MEDIASDK_MAJOR_NUMBER_FULL!' ) do ( set MEDIASDK_MAJOR_NUMBER=%%a )
::- Now parse the MediaSDK Package number i.e., MEDIASDK_PKG_NUMBER from MEDIASDK_PKG_NUMBER_FULL, it will be of the form 21-Beta-windows-x86-MM ::- Split on the - keyword for /f "tokens=1,2 delims=-" %%a in ( 'echo !MEDIASDK_PKG_NUMBER_FULL!' ) do ( set MEDIASDK_PKG_NUMBER=%%a set MEDIASDK_MILESTONE=%%b )
echo MEDIASDK_PKG_NUMBER: !MEDIASDK_PKG_NUMBER! echo MEDIASDK_MILESTONE: !MEDIASDK_MILESTONE!
if Not "!MEDIASDK_PKG_NUMBER!"=="%COPYARTIFACT_BUILD_NUMBER_MEDIASDK_PKG%" ( echo [ERROR]The Media SDK Package number parsed from the filename differs from the one whose artifacts have been copied. exit /b 1 )
set MediaSDKProductVersion=%MEDIASDK_MAJOR_NUMBER%.%MEDIASDK_MINOR_NUMBER%.%MEDIASDK_BUILD_NUMBER%.%MEDIASDK_PKG_NUMBER% echo MEDIASDK Being Used MediaSDKProductVersion: %MediaSDKProductVersion%
set MediaSDKProductName=Media SDK %MEDIASDK_MAJOR_NUMBER%.%MEDIASDK_MINOR_NUMBER% set MEDIASDK_DIR_VERSION=!MEDIASDK_MAJOR_NUMBER!.!MEDIASDK_MINOR_NUMBER!
if Not "%MEDIASDK_MILESTONE%"=="GA" ( set MediaSDKProductName=%MediaSDKProductName% %MEDIASDK_MILESTONE% set MEDIASDK_DIR_VERSION=!MEDIASDK_DIR_VERSION!-!MEDIASDK_MILESTONE! )
echo MediaSDKProductName: %MediaSDKProductName% echo MEDIASDK_DIR_VERSION: !MEDIASDK_DIR_VERSION!
::------------------------------------------- ::-Get the ComputeSDK_BUILD_NUMBER ComputeSDK_PB_MM_OpenCV_Release_x64_v110_3.0-0.20.37-ALPHA
for /r %%i in (ComputeSDK_PB_MM_*_%C%_%PLATFORM_ARCH_VS%_%T%_*.7z) do ( set ComputeSDK_MM_FILENAME=%%~ni )
echo Compute SDK MergeModule filename: %ComputeSDK_MM_FILENAME% REM set ComputeSDK_PKG_NUMBER=%COPYARTIFACT_BUILD_NUMBER_ComputeSDK_PKG%
for /f "tokens=8 delims=_" %%a in ('echo !ComputeSDK_MM_FILENAME!') do ( set ComputeSDKProductVersionFULL=%%a )
::- This will be something like: 3.0-0.20.37-ALPHA echo ComputeSDKProductVersionFULL: %ComputeSDKProductVersionFULL%
::- Now split the ComputeSDKProductVersionFULL using the . character. for /f "tokens=1,2,3,4 delims=." %%a in ('echo !ComputeSDKProductVersionFULL!') do ( set ComputeSDK_MAJOR_NUMBER=%%a set ComputeSDK_MINOR_NUMBER_FULL=%%b set ComputeSDK_BUILD_NUMBER=%%c set ComputeSDK_PKG_NUMBER_FULL=%%d )
::- Now split the ComputeSDK_MINOR_NUMBER_FULL using the - character. for /f "tokens=1,2 delims=-" %%a in ('echo !ComputeSDK_MINOR_NUMBER_FULL!') do ( set ComputeSDK_MINOR_NUMBER=%%a set ComputeSDK_SUBMINOR_NUMBER=%%b )
::- Now split the ComputeSDK_PKG_NUMBER_FULL using the - character. for /f "tokens=1,2 delims=-" %%a in ('echo !ComputeSDK_PKG_NUMBER_FULL!') do ( set ComputeSDK_PKG_NUMBER=%%a set ComputeSDK_MILESTONE=%%b ) echo ComputeSDK Being Used: %ComputeSDKProductVersion% echo ComputeSDK Milestone: !ComputeSDK_MILESTONE!
echo ComputeSDK_MAJOR_NUMBER: !ComputeSDK_MAJOR_NUMBER! echo ComputeSDK_MINOR_NUMBER: !ComputeSDK_MINOR_NUMBER! echo ComputeSDK_SUBMINOR_NUMBER: !ComputeSDK_SUBMINOR_NUMBER! echo ComputeSDK_PKG_NUMBER: !ComputeSDK_PKG_NUMBER!
set ComputeSDKProductName=%ComputeSDK_MAJOR_NUMBER%.%ComputeSDK_MINOR_NUMBER%-%ComputeSDK_SUBMINOR_NUMBER% if Not "%ComputeSDK_MILESTONE%"=="GA" ( set ComputeSDKProductName=%ComputeSDKProductName% %ComputeSDK_MILESTONE% )
set ComputeSDK_DIR_VERSION=!ComputeSDK_MAJOR_NUMBER!.!ComputeSDK_MINOR_NUMBER!-%ComputeSDK_SUBMINOR_NUMBER% if Not "%ComputeSDK_MILESTONE%"=="GA" ( set ComputeSDK_DIR_VERSION=%ComputeSDK_DIR_VERSION%-%ComputeSDK_MILESTONE% )
echo ComputeSDKProductName: %ComputeSDKProductName% echo ComputeSDK_DIR_VERSION: %ComputeSDK_DIR_VERSION%
::--------------------------------------------------------------------- set NEW_SETUP_NAME=AMD-ComputeSDKInstaller-v%ARTIFACT_PRODUCTVERSION%-%OSTYPE%-%M%-%P% set ISM=%WORKSPACE%\UnifiedInstaller.ism set MM_DIR=%WORKSPACE%\MM set COMMMON_MM_DIR=%ProgramFiles(x86)%\Common Files\Merge Modules
echo [INFO]Calling "%PERL%" -pi.bak -e "s?setup_%P%?%NEW_SETUP_NAME%?g;" "%ISM%" %PERL% -pi.bak -e "s?setup_%P%?%NEW_SETUP_NAME%?g;" "%ISM%"
echo [INFO]Calling %PERL% -pi.bak -e "s?MediaSDKProductName_PLACEHOLDER?%MediaSDKProductName%?g;" "%ISM%" %PERL% -pi.bak -e "s?MediaSDKProductName_PLACEHOLDER?%MediaSDKProductName%?g;" "%ISM%"
echo [INFO]Calling %PERL% -pi.bak -e "s?APPSDKProductVersion_PLACEHOLDER?%ComputeSDKProductName%?g;" "%ISM%" %PERL% -pi.bak -e "s?APPSDKProductVersion_PLACEHOLDER?%ComputeSDKProductName%?g;" "%ISM%"
echo Executing: "%ISCMDBLD%" -a %P% -r %M% -v -x -p "%ISM%" -o "%MM_DIR%,%COMMMON_MM_DIR%" -y %PRODUCT_VERSION% -z ProductName="%ProductName%" -z ProductVersion=%PRODUCT_VERSION% -z MAJORNUMBER=%MAJOR_NUMBER% -z MINORNUMBER=%MINOR_NUMBER% -z BUILDNUMBER=%BUILD_NUMBER% -z PACKAGENUMBER=0 -z MEDIASDK_PRODUCTNAME="%MediaSDKProductName%" -z MEDIASDK_PRODUCT_VERSION=%MediaSDKProductVersion% -z APPSDK_PRODUCTNAME="Compute SDK %ComputeSDKProductName%" -z APPSDK_PRODUCT_VERSION="%ComputeSDKProductVersionFULL%" -z COMPUTESDK_DIR_VERSION="%ComputeSDK_DIR_VERSION%" -z COMPUTESDK_METRIC_VERSION="%ComputeSDK_DIR_VERSION%" -z MEDIASDK_METRIC_VERSION="!MEDIASDK_DIR_VERSION!" -l CertPath=%SystemDrive%\cert "%ISCMDBLD%" -a %P% -r %M% -v -x -p "%ISM%" -o "%MM_DIR%,%COMMMON_MM_DIR%" -y %PRODUCT_VERSION% -z ProductName="%ProductName%" -z ProductVersion=%PRODUCT_VERSION% -z MAJORNUMBER=%MAJOR_NUMBER% -z MINORNUMBER=%MINOR_NUMBER% -z BUILDNUMBER=%BUILD_NUMBER% -z PACKAGENUMBER=0 -z MEDIASDK_PRODUCTNAME="%MediaSDKProductName%" -z MEDIASDK_PRODUCT_VERSION=%MediaSDKProductVersion% -z APPSDK_PRODUCTNAME="Compute SDK %ComputeSDKProductName%" -z APPSDK_PRODUCT_VERSION="%ComputeSDKProductVersionFULL%" -z COMPUTESDK_DIR_VERSION="%ComputeSDK_DIR_VERSION%" -z COMPUTESDK_METRIC_VERSION="%ComputeSDK_DIR_VERSION%" -z MEDIASDK_METRIC_VERSION="!MEDIASDK_DIR_VERSION!" -l CertPath=%SystemDrive%\cert
endlocal

hudson.plugins.emailext.ExtendedEmailPub.defaultContent:
CAS Build System  |  Update preferences  |  Unsubscribe

SDK Installer Notification

STATUS

The CAS Build System finished building the $PROJECT_NAME

Status: $BUILD_STATUS
BuildNumber: $MAJOR_NUMBER.$MINOR_NUMBER.$BUILD_NUMBER
Originator: $CAUSE
Changes: $CHANGES
Download URL: $JOB_URL
Build Console: $BUILD_URL/console

AMD | AMD Central
